item.title: Contract Generator
item.description:
Purpose

Created an internal tool for a human resources company to automatically generate employment contracts from Excel data and a PDF template.

Key Features

The script reads candidate and contract details from spreadsheets, fills PDF form fields, and exports one finalized contract per employee.

Challenges

Several libraries seemed suitable, but they all had problems processing Chinese characters. Ultimately, the issue was successfully solved using a Java PDF library(Apache PDFBox)

Implementation

Designed PDF form fields to match Excel column headers. Used Apache POI to read spreadsheet data and Apache PDFBox to populate PDF form fields and generate output files.

item.title: RPA Printing Automation
item.description:
Purpose

The project delivered a fully automated document printing platform integrated with ERP systems, supporting millions of inspection and quality certificates annually and ensuring regulatory compliance in large-scale pharmaceutical logistics.

Key Features

Automatically check for new print tasks on schedule

Challenges

The ERP system was developed with an older Builder 7 framework, and some controls are difficult to locate due to missing distinct attributes, requiring innovative solutions.

Implementation

The main framework uses visual low-code automation software, combined with Python automation libraries.

item.title: RPA Social Insurance Automation
item.description:
Purpose

In a human resources outsourcing company with numerous projects and high employee turnover, social insurance enrollment and cancellation processes were performed frequently.

Automated repetitive web operations and data submission on third-party sites.

Key Features

Monitor emails, read specific email Excel attachments, and open the official website to process social insurance contributions or cancellations.

Challenges

The official page updates frequently, and the submission logic may change. Some date controls use a click-to-popup selection style, making automation more challenging.
